alert.note: Alert for Caguas; Carolina; Guaynabo; Gurabo; San Juan; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 03 at 1:48AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM AST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Caguas, Carolina, Guaynabo, Gurabo, San Juan and Trujillo Alto. * WHEN...Until 245 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1248 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Juan, Trujillo Alto, Gurabo, Caguas, Carolina, Guaynabo, Bairoa, Celada, Santa Barbara and Lomas. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Caguas; Carolina; Guaynabo; Gurabo; San Juan; Trujillo Alto
